articles.content: Microsoft has decided to unbundle Teams from Office at a global level, according to a new Reuters report today. The move comes around half a year after the company did the exact same thing for EU mar… [+1237 chars]

articles.title: Japanese authorities inspect second Kobayashi Pharma factory after deaths - Reuters
articles.description: Kobayashi said it found what appeared to be potentially toxic puberulic acid that could have been produced by blue mold penicillium in Beni-Koji materials produced between last April and October at its Osaka factory.
